about_the_game:
Dress up as a bovine beau or belle with the Cow Costume for STORY OF SEASONS: Friends of Mineral Town. You'll mooove the townsfolk with your fashion sense!

To use this item in-game, examine the Mirror in your house to change your outfit.
detailed_description:
Dress up as a bovine beau or belle with the Cow Costume for STORY OF SEASONS: Friends of Mineral Town. You'll mooove the townsfolk with your fashion sense!

To use this item in-game, examine the Mirror in your house to change your outfit.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8265U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 620
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Cow Costume is for use with STORY OF SEASONS: Friends of Mineral Town.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
